text: z In line with the Integrated Water Management Plan for the Isle of Dogs and South Poplar, opportunities for greywater re-use should be investigated. 478 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS 4.7 Millharbour Figure 49: 4.7 Millharbour (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Tower Hamlets Local Plan 479 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS
